entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kindersley Airport 10:52 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Fog. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 9:22 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:22 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:22 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
